channel.title: Joy Smith
channel.description: Recent news about Joy Smith, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
Man convicted of human trafficking in Ottawa shows 'kids not for sale': MP Smith
'There are many cases across Canada, it's happening every day,' says Conservative MP Joy Smith, a strong advocate against human trafficking. Photograph courtesy of Joy Smith. The fighter: Tory MP Joy Smith has been fighting against human trafficking ...

item.title: Mentioned by The Epoch Times
item.description:
Porn Filter Spurs Debate
Tory MP Joy Smith, known for her battle against human trafficking and the sexual exploitation of children, hopes to spark a national debate about protecting children from the impact of pornography. (Courtesy of Joy Smith). We need to start a conversation ...

item.title: Mentioned by Standard Freeholder
item.description:
Tory MP Joy Smith wants people to 'opt-in' for online porn
Winnipeg MP Joy Smith says proposed initiatives to block adult content online are about the safety of children and have nothing to do with censorship. Smith, the Conservative MP for Kildonan, is on board with British Prime Minister David Cameron's measures ...
